mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM t_user_trapos_assess_info WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{map.sn}, sn_list)
mapper.delete: delete from t_user_trapos_assess_info where id=#{map.assess_id} AND manager_id=#{map.manager_id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.user_id, t.manager_id, t.assess_name, t.assess_type, t.status, t.sn_list, t.deduct_money, t.expenditure, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.remark, t.create_by, t.job_id, t.update_by, DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(t.cre_date, t.cre_time), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS cre_date, DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(t.up_date, t.up_time), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS up_date, t1.user_tel FROM t_user_trapos_assess_info t LEFT JOIN t_user_info t1 ON t.user_id = t1.id where t.id=#{assess_id}
mapper.update: update t_user_trapos_assess_info set job_id=#{map.job_id} where id=#{map.id}
